synopsis.text: Centering around the brilliant duo of Josef Kou Hiraga, a prodigious scientist, and Roberto Nicholas, an expert in archives and cryptanalysis, this anime delves into the world of Vatican City's secret organization, the Assembly of Saints. As miracle investigators, the pair traverse the globe, scrutinizing purported miracles to discern their veracity. Yet, amidst these seemingly divine occurrences, they frequently encounter sinister conspiracies, enigmatic murders, and devil worship. As they strive to unravel the truth behind these events, Hiraga and Roberto must rely on their unique skills and unwavering faith to withstand the evils they encounter on their quest for a genuine miracle. Will their bond remain steadfast amidst the darkness they uncover? Only time will tell. (Source: Original synopsis, rewritten)
